sentences.cn: 自由创作的爵士乐即兴演出

sentences.en: As usual, the Solo knack for improvisation left much to be desired.
sentences.cn: 和往常一样, 索洛的即兴发挥总能带来很多副作用.

sentences.en: But when I make this improvisation.
sentences.cn: 但当我做出这个即兴创作时.

sentences.en: He coached the young man in the theatre and developed his power of improvisation.
sentences.cn: 他辅导那位年轻人演戏,培养他的即席表演能力.

sentences.en: However, the two key elements of jazz are swing and improvisation.
sentences.cn: 但是, 爵士乐的两大基本要素是摇摆乐和即兴创作.

sentences.en: Improvisation - automatically repair's the leader's current bunker or vehicle.
sentences.cn: 马上做 - 自动修理领导者现在所在的碉堡或车辆.

sentences.en: It needed great powers of reasoning and improvisation.
sentences.cn: 这需要极大的推理和临时拼凑的能力.

sentences.en: It was the improvisation of the ebullition.
sentences.cn: 它是激情迸发的即兴创作。 哟！

sentences.en: Jazz musicians use collective improvisation as they play it.
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐人在演奏时集体即兴创作音乐.

sentences.en: Most of their music was spontaneous improvisation.
sentences.cn: 他们的大部分音乐作品都是即兴创作的.

sentences.en: The guitar player interluded with a beautiful improvisation.
sentences.cn: 这位吉他演奏者在两段节目中间来了一段动人的即兴演奏.

sentences.en: The most important of these is improvisation.
sentences.cn: 其中最重要的一种是即兴演出.

sentences.en: The oboist is well known for his improvisation.
sentences.cn: 这位双簧管吹奏者以即兴演奏而著名.

sentences.en: The pianist's improvisation of the accompaniment won storming applause from the audience.
sentences.cn: 钢琴家的即兴伴奏赢得了观众雷鸣般的掌声.

sentences.en: This lesson introduces basic improvisation concepts and patterns.
sentences.cn: 课程将介绍即兴演奏的基本概念和方式.

sentences.en: Whatever success I had achieved since 1955 was obtained through experimentation and improvisation.
sentences.cn: 我自1955年以来所取得的无论什么样的成绩,都是通过实验和创新取得的.

words.tran_cn: 即兴创作；临时做，临时提供（improvise的过去分词）
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供

trans.tran_cn: 即兴创作，即兴演说，即兴作品，急就章
